grovel.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to praise someone a lot or behave with a lot of respect towards them because you think that they are important and will be able to help you in some way â€“ used to show disapproval
grovel.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I had to really grovel to the bank manager to get a loan.
grovel.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to move along the ground on your hands and knees
grovel.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I saw him grovelling in the road for his hat.
